titles.title: Honoring the BAPS Hindu-American community and the 50th Anniversary of its Mandir in Flushing, New York.
Honoring the BAPS Hindu-American community and the 50th Anniversary of its Mandir in Flushing, New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary:
This resolution honors the Bochansanwasi Akshar Purushottom Swaminarayan Sanstha (BAPS) Hindu-American community for its spiritual and cultural contributions to the United States.
The resolution also commends the BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir in Flushing, New York, on its 50th anniversary.
